attributes.action: Stop All Benefits to Imigrants living in the UK , They are here to work! Not Sponge off the tax payer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned ask Tony Blair to stop Immigrants from outside of the UK who have come here to work claiming any sort of benefits for themselves or Children back home. They are here to work not claim Tax payers £££'s. Also stop immigrants exploiting the NHS and pay for treatment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
